title: FPS DROP
body: I usually get 120 fps the highest setting and don't get any fps drop .. Now it randomly drops to 30 fps .. Heres my specs GTX 760 and A4-6300

replies.body: i've been having problems since this patch came out, the previous patch i used to run at 70-80 fps, now i can't play a single game cause it's 20fps all game and like 5-10 fps on teamfights, i just refused to play untill the next patch or if any solution pops up.

It is possible for your pc[ too good](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs).  You may need to go to your video settings in-game and cap your frame rate as a result to fix that up.  

Otherwise, an outdated driver or bad game file could be the culprit.  You'll want to go over the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to troubleshoot.  Let me know if you have any questions!

or maybe you need to stop giving 30 % of the community "fps guide" that doesnt solve anything at all!
wake up riot. people cant play lol anymore, sad that even a russian riot admitted that the latest patch has an issue.... just sad..

FPS issues can happen for a variety of reasons, and pulling a random answer out of my bum doesn't help anyone.  Not recommending a guide specific to a player's issue is simply doing them a disservice.  That guide helps rule out possibilities- and many times fixes the issue.  

It doesn't mean the end line either.  We're happy to continue helping as much as we can to get things in order.  If you're having an issue I'm happy to help.
i am having issue like everyone else. and i sended in a zip file of my hextech repair tool to riot but yall havent answered for a long time now
What's your ticket number?  I'll take a look and see what's up.

Thanks!  I see the specialist requested some more info the other day, and your response was submitted today.  He'll go over the information you provided and get back to you as soon as he can.  Hang tight!
bro he's running a gtx 760, his PC isn't too good.
I cap my fps at 144 because there's no need to have 250-300 fps in this game and I'm getting 115 all the way down to 33 in the past few games. You're not the only one.
Same. I usually get up to 170 frames and as low as 30ms but recently I've been getting 50fps and 50 to 5k ms. Something is wrong.
its their 7.4 patch.. they refuse to fix it and have been blaming others
if you could fix the problem let me know plis.
I have the same issue. you are not the only one.
lol have a worse computer and i get the same fps drop from 90 to 15 regardless of if the settings are on very high or very low
